casebody.data:
MCLAREN PERFORMANCE TECHNOLOGIES, INC. (Also known as McLaren Auto Group Inc. and Formerly known as Asha Corporation), Plaintiff-Appellant, v. DANA CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellee. No. 01-1270. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Jan. 8, 2002.

Before MICHEL, BRYSON and LINN, Circuit Judges.

*949 Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
